page.title: 14SHOPPING(Survey-Part two)
page.content: 2.SHOPPING The inhabitants of Croftlands and Bardsea have a wide choice as to where to shop. They can go about 2 miles into Ulverston where there are 3 small supermarkets and a good variety of other small shops.There is also a market on Thursdays and Saturdays. Alternatively they can go 8 miles to Barrow which has many large shops including an ASDA superstore which is very popular.Bardsea has a P.O., Croftlands has 2 food shops,a P.O., hairdressers and a laundrette. The results of our survey seem to show that most people go to Barrow at least once a month,Ulverston weekly and also use the local shops regularly DAILY WEEKLY MONTHLY NEVER LOCAL 39% 53% 6% 2% ULV'STON 12% 84% 2% 2% BARROW 3% 18% 72% 7%
